Module com.example.cab302simplestock
Package com.example.cab302simplestock.model.InterfaceDAOs

Interface IItemDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
SqliteItemDAO
public interface IItemDAO
CRUD interface for interacting with items in a database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    addItem(Item item)
    Adds a new item to a database.
    void
    deleteItem(Item item)
    Deletes an item in a database, should be chosen by the item ID.
    Item
    findItemByID(int itemId)
    Searches for a single item by its ID value.
    List<Item>
    getAllItems()
    Gets all items in a database, should set all values in the Group model.
    List<Item>
    getItemByNameInCategory(String itemName, int categoryID)
    Searches and finds all items with the chosen name in a specific category.
    void
    updateItem(Item item)
    Updates an item in the database, the item ID should be used to find which item to update.

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      int addItem(Item item)
      Adds a new item to a database. The ID should be set by the database.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to add.

    • updateItem

      void updateItem(Item item)
      Updates an item in the database, the item ID should be used to find which item to update.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to update, the ID should be set.

    • deleteItem

      void deleteItem(Item item)
      Deletes an item in a database, should be chosen by the item ID.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to delete, the ID value should be set.

    • getAllItems

      List<Item> getAllItems()
      Gets all items in a database, should set all values in the Group model.
      Returns:
      A list of items.

    • findItemByID

      Item findItemByID(int itemId)
      Searches for a single item by its ID value.
      Parameters:
      itemId - The ID of the item that's wanted.
      Returns:
      The Item object with the inputted ID.

    • getItemByNameInCategory

      List<Item> getItemByNameInCategory(String itemName, int categoryID)
      Searches and finds all items with the chosen name in a specific category.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name that every item should have.
      categoryID - The ID of the category to search items in.
      Returns:
      A list of all items found.
